security: The document contains personal information about Robert Scheer, including his residences, employment history, family member information, and foreign travel. Releasing this information could violate his privacy.
summary: This document is a US Army Request for a National Agency Check (NAC) on Robert Scheer, initiated on January 4, 1967, to investigate his background, residences, employment, and foreign connections.
summary_one_paragraph: A U.S. Army request for a National Agency Check (NAC) on Robert Scheer, dated January 4, 1967, seeks to verify Scheer's background using available records. The document details Scheer's personal information, including his birth date and place, social security number, family details, past residences from 1949 to 1965, employment history from 1960 to 1965 including City Lights Bookstore and Rampart's Magazine, and foreign travel to Cuba, England, France, Poland, Hungary, Soviet Union, Czechoslovakia, Vietnam, Cambodia, Indonesia, Japan, Laos, and Thailand; the request also notes Scheer refused to provide fingerprints and was processed by Headquarters, USAINTC at Fort Holabird, Maryland.
title: [RESTRICTED]
